Package com.espertech.esper.event.util

Utilities around event rendering are here.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
OutputValueRenderer For rendering an output value returned by a property.
 

Class Summary
EventRendererImpl Provider for rendering services of EventBean events.
EventTypePropertyPair Pair of event type and property.
GetterPair Value-object for rendering support of a simple property value (non-nested).
JSONRendererImpl Render for the JSON format.
NestedGetterPair Value-object for rendering support of a nested property value.
OutputValueRendererBase Renderer for a Object values that can simply be output via to-string.
OutputValueRendererFactory For rendering an output value returned by a property.
OutputValueRendererJSONString Renderer for a String-value into JSON strings.
OutputValueRendererXMLString Renderer for a String-value into XML strings.
RendererMeta Renderer cache for event type metadata allows fast rendering of a given type of events.
RendererMetaOptions Options for use by RendererMeta with rendering metadata.
XMLRendererImpl Renderer for XML-formatted properties.
 

Package com.espertech.esper.event.util Description

Utilities around event rendering are here.
